page.title: 05Dunnington Baptist Church
page.content: The church was built in 1878, and the church hall in 1909 along with a caretakers cottage and the Manse. Its congregation comes from Harvington, Broom, Inkberrow, Cock Bevington and Atch Lench. About 30 people attend Sunday evening services. There is also a Tuesday Bible Study Group. The minister also conducts services at churches in Alvechurch, Kempsey, Atch Lench, Pershore, Studley and Alcester. There are only 3 or 4 children in the congregation at Dunnington. Sometimes strangers come to the services. The minister lives in Redditch. He has been preaching for 50 years.
